transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji good morning.
Executive: Good morning mam. Ji ji aapne call kiya tha IndiaMART customer care se bataiye mam kya issue tha.
Customer: Actually humne IndiaMART ke liye na ek naya employee appoint kiya hai to usko hum basic training aapse dilwana chahte hain.
Executive: Training training aap unka number mujhe whatsapp kar denge mam please fir unko training provide kar dungi mam.
Customer: Theek hai aaj hamara weekly off hota hai monday hai to aap kal unse baat kar lijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai kal baat kar lungi main iske alava ha lekin iske alava iske alava IndiaMART pe hame appropriate buyleads nahi aate hain.
Customer: Continuously main isko monitor kar rahi hu kafi dino se but do I buy some buyleads but if I say that appropriate buyleads are coming they are not coming.
Executive: Yes last time agar aapko yaad hoga humne aapse discuss kiya tha aur maine bataya tha ki aapki do hi category hai aapne aapne bataya tha industrial paper cutting blade hai aur dusra aapne paper cutting knives bataya tha iske alava aapne bola tha.
Customer: Aur grinding grinding machines ka bataya tha ki main hum jo sell karte hain wo grinding machines hai.
Executive: Okay to yahan main dekh pa rahi hu mam grinding machine karke yahan pe koi bhi category nahi added hai to main grinding machine.
Customer: Surface grinding nahi surface grinding machines ki category hai yahan pe aur naam se bhi isko bol sakte hain mam.
Executive: Nahi isko hum grinding machines hi bolte hain surface grinding machines isme automatic bhi aati hai manual bhi aati hai.
Customer: Okay ha surface grinding added hai mam.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji koi isi ko ha surface ki product map isme hum aur multiple product map karenge confirm ye tha ki jaise last time humne discuss kiya tha kuch relevant keyword bhi add kiye the jaise approximate 69 product add kiye the but unka jaise agar main koi keyword add kar rahi hu to unka price specification multiple.
Customer: Dekhiye jo hamare hamare products hai na wo industrial good products hai har size ke according uska rate badal jata hai.
Customer: To isliye hum log koi bhi fixed price nahi add kar sakte wo inquiry pe hi hum no issue aap specification to add kar sakte hain specification and images to add kar sakte hain na price nahi add kariye fir agar aapko lagta hai ki price nahi add karna hai agar har product har model and har month wo vary karta hai price to aap price.
Customer: specialization to har product bhi added hai usme no mam overall aapke 69 product added hai isme se 38 product me specification nahi added hai mam.
Customer: 16 out of 16 aur jaise jaise ki main dekh pa rahi thi yahan par PNS call PNS call aapke pass IndiaMART se direct call aati hai last two months se uska feedback sahi hai direct call direct direct call ka jo phone number hai ab to wo mera jata hai aur direct call mujhe hi aati hai.
Executive: Haan abhi abhi jab se aapka number add hua hai tab se isse pehle matlab file mam ka number sorry bhavesh bhai ka number tha to call answer nahi hoti thi us vajah se wo usme bhi thoda nahi ab to ye bahut der se this has been already rectified mam ye to do mahine ho gaye ab to mere number added hai.
Customer: Last two months se abhi theek chal raha hai iske jo aap buyleads consume kar rahe hain mam main dekh pa rahi thi 80 matlab 30% hi aap fresh buyleads jo within a four hour use kar rahe hain jaise baad me koi buyleads post kiya to aapne consume karke usko call kar liya to 30% hi buyleads aisi hai jo aap appropriate consume kar pa rahe hain jaise abhi last month ki summary batati hu november month ki 18 buyleads aisi hai jo aapne fresh consume ki 26 buyleads aisi hai jo aapne char panch ghante baad jaise morning me buyleads requirement post kiya to aap usko 2 baje 3 baje contact kar rahe hain 13 buyleads aisi hai ki aapne kal kisi ne requirement post kiya tha aur ab aaj usko call kar rahe hain to jo 18 buyleads aapne consume ki usme might be buyer aapko response kare aapko entertain kare aapko quotation le le but jo purani buyleads bachi 26 and plus 13 to 39 ho gaye total mam theek hai to wo jo 39 buyleads hai usme might be aapse pehle aur bhi supplier ne contact kar liya hoga to might be buyer ka requirement bhi fulfill ho chuka hoga ya do se teen quotation approximate usko ja chuke honge to might be wo shayad aapko entertain na kare.
Customer: Chaliye aap you just give us a solution that isko hum aur kis tarah se kar sakte hain already I have appointed one girl for this purpose and I am also in touch always sitting there in the office so kindly give us a full support so that we can have full utilization of this thing right.
Executive: Theek hai mam kal aap unka number mujhe share kar dena main unko training de dungi tab tak jo mujhe relevant keyword lag rahe hain main aur add dungi jaise aapne bola grinding machine surface grinding machine to main dekh pa rahi hu isme na matlab bahut sare correction required hai is particular category me to mujhe uske related keyword aur add karne padenge aap please main aapko whatsapp pe main aapko main aapko because we are not able to add certain pictures I tried to add because there is some specialization and specification of you know that area and all to isliye I will be sending you few pictures which I really want to add and it was I was not able to add on my end so main kal aapko aap mujhe share kar do main add kar dungi.
Customer: Kal aap 12 baje ka time rakh lijiye fix hamare sath to 12 o clock hum log ye kam karenge right.
Executive: Definitely mam definitely.
Executive: Theek hai okay thank you my good name is miss Neeru is sir and tomorrow I will be giving you all the details everything even I am not able to you know upload the logo of my company in your website I tried.
Customer: Logo ka maine aapko logo ka maine aapko bataya tha usme na only image matlab usme only alphabets and characters hi hone chahiye jo aap image upload kar rahe the wo kisi bhi reason se nahi ho pa raha tha jo aishu aap wale me aa raha tha mere wale me bhi aa raha tha.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai chaliye fir kal kal hum iske upar baat karenge theek hai okay okay bye.
Executive: Haan okay bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants training for new employee.

- Appropriate buyleads are not received.

- Specification not added in 38 products.

- Unable to upload company logo.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to provide training to new employee.

- Executive will add relevant keywords.

- Executive will help to upload product images.

- Executive will discuss logo issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share employee number for training.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, buyleads, keywords, logo, specification
